data.title: Heritage Estate Planning
data.meta_description: We offer a professional will writing service in Berkshire and the surrounding areas, with a friendly, human approach.
data.text:
Having a will is vitally important but for the majority of the UK, many people still don’t have one. Most people accrue wealth over time and when you pass away, you’ll want to transfer it to the people you choose and by having your will professionally drafted you can avoid complications and additional stress for your loved ones.

Ensure that your family are protected by making a will with Heritage Estate Planning. We will discuss your concerns and ensure we have a full understanding of your circumstances and wishes before preparing your robust and bespoke will. Our service has been designed to make things as smooth and stress-free as possible.

With the majority of people in Berkshire without a will, despite how important and simple it is to set one up, there’s now no excuse not to have one. With Heritage Estate Planning, you can write a will that offers:
